TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MachineKeyProtection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies values that indicates whether data should be encrypted or decrypted, whether a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended or validated, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection All = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data and that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or that the data should be both decrypted and validated (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection Encryption = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the data should be encrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or decrypted (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Security.MachineKeyProtection Validation = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Encode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or validated (for the <xref:System.Web.Security.Decode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
